import React from "react"; import { Container, Navbar, Row, Col, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Bar, Line } from "react-chartjs-2"; import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, LineElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, PointElement, } from "chart.js"; // Register chart components ChartJS.register( CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, LineElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, PointElement ); export default function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Sample chart data const barData = { labels: ["Q1", "Q2", "Q3", "Q4"], datasets: [ { label: "Cases Filed", data: [120, 190, 150, 210], backgroundColor: "#0d6efd", }, { label: "Evidence Uploaded", data: [80, 160, 130, 200], backgroundColor: "#198754", }, ], }; const lineData = { labels: ["2019", "2020", "2021", "2022", "2023"], datasets: [ { label: "Hearings Scheduled", data: [50, 100, 80, 150, 120], borderColor: "#ffc107", backgroundColor: "rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.2)", tension: 0.4, fill: true, }, ], }; return (
